allow:
Bash(powershell.exe -NoProfile -Command "
$file = ''C:\\Users\\RENTKAR\\Desktop\\SimpPredictDflow\\Backend\\src\\modules\\solana\\solana.service.ts''
$content = ''test content line 1'' + \\`n + ''test content line 2''
[System.IO.File]::WriteAllText\($file, $content, [System.Text.Encoding]::UTF8\)
Write-Host ''Test file written''
Get-Content $file
")

Bash(powershell.exe -Command "
$content = @''
# Build stage
FROM node:20-alpine AS builder

WORKDIR /app

COPY package*.json ./
RUN npm ci --only=production=false

COPY tsconfig.json ./
COPY prisma ./prisma/
COPY src ./src/

RUN npx prisma generate
RUN npm run build

# Production stage
FROM node:20-alpine AS production

WORKDIR /app

RUN addgroup -S simpredict && adduser -S simpredict -G simpredict

COPY package*.json ./
RUN npm ci --only=production && npm cache clean --force

COPY --from=builder /app/dist ./dist
COPY --from=builder /app/node_modules/.prisma ./node_modules/.prisma
COPY prisma ./prisma/

RUN mkdir -p logs && chown -R simpredict:simpredict /app
USER simpredict

EXPOSE 3000

HEALTHCHECK --interval=30s --timeout=10s --start-period=60s --retries=3 \\`
  CMD wget --no-verbose --tries=1 --spider http://localhost:3000/health || exit 1

CMD [""node"", ""dist/main.js""]
''@
Set-Content -Path ''C:\\Users\\RENTKAR\\Desktop\\SimpPredictDflow\\Backend\\Dockerfile'' -Value $content -Encoding UTF8
Write-Host ''Dockerfile written.''
")

Bash(printf '%s' '# FILE 1: Dockerfile
$dockerfile = @'"''"'
# Build stage
FROM node:20-alpine AS builder

WORKDIR /app

COPY package*.json ./
RUN npm ci --only=production=false

COPY tsconfig.json ./
COPY prisma ./prisma/
COPY src ./src/

RUN npx prisma generate
RUN npm run build

# Production stage
FROM node:20-alpine AS production

WORKDIR /app

RUN addgroup -S simpredict && adduser -S simpredict -G simpredict

COPY package*.json ./
RUN npm ci --only=production && npm cache clean --force

COPY --from=builder /app/dist ./dist
COPY --from=builder /app/node_modules/.prisma ./node_modules/.prisma
COPY prisma ./prisma/

RUN mkdir -p logs && chown -R simpredict:simpredict /app
USER simpredict

EXPOSE 3000

HEALTHCHECK --interval=30s --timeout=10s --start-period=60s --retries=3   CMD wget --no-verbose --tries=1 --spider http://localhost:3000/health || exit 1

CMD [""node"", ""dist/main.js""]
'"''"'
Set-Content -Path ""C:\\Users\\RENTKAR\\Desktop\\SimpPredictDflow\\Backend\\Dockerfile"" -Value $dockerfile -Encoding UTF8
Write-Host ""Dockerfile written.""
')
